post:
Selling my fantastic laptop because I just got an Asus Zenbook.

Specs:

* HP EliteBook 8560p
* 4-4.5 hrs of battery in Windows
* Intel Core i5-2520m
* 8GB DDR3 RAM
* 500GB HDD
* AMD Radeon 7400M
* Windows 7 Professional x64

Price: $240 OBO

http://imgur.com/WJytIbB and http://imgur.com/i4AeeFs

Payment via PayPal. Shipping will be via FedEx, and Laptop will be shipped within 2 business days.
